  SELECT
    LAST_DAY(DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,1), INTERVAL x MONTH)) AS month_end
  FROM 
    UNNEST(GENERATE_ARRAY(1, 12)) AS x

  SELECT 
    "$max_available_date_per_month"
)

  SUM(zugriffe) AS Zugriffe
FROM

WHERE CASE
        WHEN $month_as_number > 12 THEN $date_condition 
        ELSE date IN (SELECT month_end FROM last_12_months)
      END
      AND ("$Plattformen" = "Alle Plattformen" OR platform = "$Plattformen")
      AND broadcast_id NOT IN ($mdr_ard_kultur_podcasts)
GROUP BY Monat
ORDER BY Monat ASC

SELECT
  SUM(zugriffe) AS summe,
  branding
FROM 
  $episode_table
WHERE $date_condition
      AND broadcast_id NOT IN ($mdr_ard_kultur_podcasts)
GROUP BY branding

WITH all_podcasts AS (
  SELECT
    SUM(zugriffe) AS summe,
    podcast_title
  FROM
    $episode_table 
  WHERE $date_condition
        AND broadcast_id NOT IN ($mdr_ard_kultur_podcasts)
  GROUP BY podcast_title
), top_100 AS (
  SELECT 
    * 
  FROM
    all_podcasts
  ORDER BY summe DESC
  LIMIT 100
), rest AS (
  SELECT
    SUM(summe) AS summe,
    "Sonstige" AS podcast_title
  FROM 
    all_podcasts
  WHERE podcast_title NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT podcast_title FROM top_100)
)
SELECT 
  summe,
  CASE 
    WHEN LENGTH(podcast_title) <= 20 THEN podcast_title
    ELSE CONCAT(SUBSTR(podcast_title,0,20),"...") 
  END
FROM 
  top_100
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  * 
FROM rest
ORDER BY summe DESC

SELECT
  SUM(zugriffe) AS summe,
  genre
FROM 
  $episode_table
WHERE $date_condition
      AND broadcast_id NOT IN ($mdr_ard_kultur_podcasts)
GROUP BY genre

SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", GREATEST(0,$filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Bereiche |  ${Monat_text} ${Jahr}'))), 'Bereiche |  ${Monat:text} ${Jahr}'), 
FROM(
SELECT 'Bereiche |  ${Monat:text} ${Jahr}' as Interaktionen
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
LIMIT 1
)

WITH last_12_months AS (
  SELECT
    LAST_DAY(DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,1), INTERVAL x MONTH)) AS month_end
  FROM 
    UNNEST(GENERATE_ARRAY(1, 12)) AS x
  UNION All
  SELECT 
    "$max_available_date_per_month"
)
SELECT 
  date as Monat, 
  SUM(zugriffe) AS Zugriffe
FROM 
  $episode_table
WHERE CASE
        WHEN $month_as_number > 12 THEN $date_condition 
        ELSE date IN (SELECT month_end FROM last_12_months)
      END
      AND ("$Bereich" = "Alle Bereiche" OR branding = "$Bereich")
      AND broadcast_id NOT IN ($mdr_ard_kultur_podcasts)
GROUP BY Monat
ORDER BY Monat ASC

WITH vormonat AS (
  SELECT
    branding,
    podcast_title,
    broadcast_id,
    SUM(zugriffe) AS zugriffe,
    genre
  FROM $episode_table
  WHERE $vormonat_date_condition 
        AND ("$Bereich" = "Alle Bereiche" OR branding = "$Bereich")
        AND broadcast_id NOT IN ($mdr_ard_kultur_podcasts)
  GROUP BY branding, podcast_title, broadcast_id, genre
), vorjahresmonat AS (
  SELECT
    branding,
    podcast_title,
    broadcast_id,
    SUM(zugriffe) AS zugriffe,
    genre
  FROM $episode_table
  WHERE $vorjahresmonat_date_condition 
        AND ("$Bereich" = "Alle Bereiche" OR branding = "$Bereich")
        AND broadcast_id NOT IN ($mdr_ard_kultur_podcasts)
  GROUP BY branding, podcast_title, broadcast_id, genre
), aktuell AS (
  SELECT
    branding,
    podcast_title,
    broadcast_id,
    SUM(zugriffe) AS zugriffe,
    genre
  FROM $episode_table
  WHERE $date_condition 
        AND ("$Bereich" = "Alle Bereiche" OR branding = "$Bereich")
        AND broadcast_id NOT IN ($mdr_ard_kultur_podcasts)
  GROUP BY branding, podcast_title, broadcast_id, genre
),
joined_zugriffe AS (
  SELECT 
  aktuell.branding, 
  aktuell.podcast_title, 
  aktuell.zugriffe AS aktuelle_zugriffe,
  vormonat.zugriffe AS vormonat_zugriffe, 
  vorjahresmonat.zugriffe AS vorjahresmonat_zugriffe
  FROM aktuell
  LEFT JOIN vormonat USING(broadcast_id)
  LEFT JOIN vorjahresmonat USING(broadcast_id)
)
SELECT 
  branding AS Bereich,
  podcast_title AS Podcast,
  aktuelle_zugriffe AS Zugriffe,
  CASE 
    WHEN $month_as_number > 12 THEN CAST(NULL AS INT64)
    ELSE aktuelle_zugriffe - vormonat_zugriffe
  END AS AbsoluteAenderungVormonat,
  CASE
    WHEN $month_as_number > 12 THEN CAST(NULL AS INT64)
    ELSE (aktuelle_zugriffe / vormonat_zugriffe - 1) * 100
  END AS ProzentAenderungVormonat,
  aktuelle_zugriffe - vorjahresmonat_zugriffe AS AbsoluteAenderungVorjahresmonat,
  (aktuelle_zugriffe / vorjahresmonat_zugriffe - 1) * 100 AS ProzentAenderungVorjahresmonat
FROM joined_zugriffe
ORDER BY aktuelle_zugriffe DESC

SELECT 
  podcast_title,
  headline,
  publication_date,
  SUM(zugriffe) AS zugriffe
FROM 
  $episode_table
WHERE $date_condition 
      AND ("$Bereich" = "Alle Bereiche" OR branding = "$Bereich")
      AND broadcast_id NOT IN ($mdr_ard_kultur_podcasts)
GROUP BY podcast_title, headline, publication_date
ORDER BY zugriffe DESC
LIMIT 1000

query.rawSql:
SELECT a.LRA
FROM (
SELECT "NDR" as LRA
) as a
ORDER BY (
  CASE
    WHEN REGEXP_CONTAINS(LOWER("${__user.email}"), LOWER(a.LRA))
    THEN 1
    ELSE 0
  END
) DESC

WITH months AS (
  SELECT 'Januar' AS month_name, 1 AS month_value, DATE($Jahr,02,05) AS min_date
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Februar', 2, DATE($Jahr,03,05)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'März', 3, DATE($Jahr,04,05)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'April', 4, DATE($Jahr,05,05)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Mai', 5, DATE($Jahr,06,05)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Juni', 6, DATE($Jahr,07,05)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Juli', 7, DATE($Jahr,08,05)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'August', 8, DATE($Jahr,09,05)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'September', 9, DATE($Jahr,10,05)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Oktober', 10, DATE($Jahr,11,05)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'November', 11, DATE($Jahr,12,05)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Dezember', 12, DATE($Jahr+1,01,05)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT '1. Quartal', 13, DATE($Jahr,04,05)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT '2. Quartal', 14, DATE($Jahr,07,05)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT '3. Quartal', 15, DATE($Jahr,10,05)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT '4. Quartal', 16, DATE($Jahr+1,01,05)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT '1. Halbjahr', 17, DATE($Jahr,07,05)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT '2. Halbjahr', 18, DATE($Jahr+1,01,05)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Jahr', 19, DATE($Jahr+1,01,05)
)
SELECT month_name
FROM months
ORDER BY
CASE
WHEN month_value = (SELECT MAX(month_value) FROM months WHERE "$today_date"  >= min_date AND month_value <= 12) AND $Jahr = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM DATE("$today_date")) THEN 0
ELSE 1 END, month_value ASC

SELECT CAST(number AS STRING) FROM (
SELECT
CASE "$Monat"
WHEN "Januar" THEN 1
WHEN "Februar" THEN 2
WHEN "März" THEN 3
WHEN "April" THEN 4
WHEN "Mai" THEN 5
WHEN "Juni" THEN 6
WHEN "Juli" THEN 7
WHEN "August" THEN 8
WHEN "September" THEN 9
WHEN "Oktober" THEN 10
WHEN "November" THEN 11
WHEN "Dezember" THEN 12
WHEN "1. Quartal" THEN 13
WHEN "2. Quartal" THEN 14
WHEN "3. Quartal" THEN 15
WHEN "4. Quartal" THEN 16
WHEN "1. Halbjahr" THEN 17
WHEN "2. Halbjahr" THEN 18
WHEN "Jahr" THEN 19
END as number)

WITH alle_jahre AS(
SELECT DISTINCT EXTRACT(YEAR from date) as jahr
FROM $platform_table
WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR from date) > 2021)
 
SELECT CAST(jahr AS STRING)
FROM alle_jahre
ORDER BY
CASE
WHEN jahr = (SELECT MAX(jahr) FROM alle_jahre WHERE "$today_date" >= DATE(jahr || '-02-05')) THEN 0
ELSE 1 END, jahr DESC

SELECT platform FROM (SELECT DISTINCT platform, 1 as sort 
FROM   $platform_table
UNION DISTINCT
SELECT "Alle Plattformen", 0 as sort)
WHERE platform != ""
Order by sort, platform ASC

SELECT branding FROM (SELECT DISTINCT branding, CASE branding WHEN "NDR Info" THEN -1 ELSE 1 END as sort 
FROM   $profiles_table
WHERE CASE "$LRA"
WHEN "MDR" THEN branding != "ARD Kultur"
ELSE TRUE END
UNION DISTINCT
SELECT "Alle Bereiche", 0 as sort)
WHERE branding != ""
Order by sort, branding ASC

WITH all_podcasts AS(
  SELECT podcast_title FROM $profiles_table
  WHERE CASE "$LRA"
  WHEN "MDR" THEN branding != "ARD Kultur"
  ELSE TRUE END
  UNION ALL
  SELECT "Alle Titel" as podcast_title
)
SELECT podcast_title FROM(
SELECT DISTINCT REPLACE(podcast_title,'"','') AS podcast_title, CASE podcast_title WHEN "Alle Titel" THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS sort  FROM all_podcasts
ORDER BY sort,podcast_title DESC
)
ORDER BY SORT, LOWER(podcast_title) ASC

WITH all_genres AS(
  SELECT genre FROM $profiles_table
  UNION ALL
  SELECT "Alle Genres" as genre 
)
SELECT genre FROM(
SELECT DISTINCT REPLACE(genre,'"','') AS genre, CASE genre WHEN "Alle Genres" THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS sort  FROM all_genres
ORDER BY sort,genre DESC
)
ORDER BY SORT, LOWER(genre) ASC

SELECT CASE $month_as_number

-- CASE 1. Quartal
WHEN 13 THEN CASE
               -- SUB-CASE no data for this time period
               WHEN '$current_timestamp' < TIMESTAMP(DATETIME($Jahr, 1, 6, 7, 0, 0)) THEN "date IN (DATE($Jahr,1,31), LAST_DAY(DATE($Jahr,2,1)), DATE($Jahr,3,31))"
               -- SUB-CASE all months are closed
                WHEN '$current_timestamp' >= TIMESTAMP(DATETIME($Jahr, 4, 5, 7, 0, 0)) THEN "date IN (DATE($Jahr,1,31), LAST_DAY(DATE($Jahr,2,1)), DATE($Jahr,3,31))"
               -- SUB-CASE only January and February are closed
                WHEN '$current_timestamp' >= TIMESTAMP(DATETIME($Jahr, 3, 5, 7, 0, 0)) THEN
                     CASE 
                     -- SUB-SUB-CASE there is data for CURRENT_DATE - 5
                        WHEN EXTRACT(HOUR FROM TIMESTAMP('$current_timestamp')) >= 7 THEN "date IN (DATE($Jahr,1,31), LAST_DAY(DATE($Jahr,2,1)), DATE_SUB('$today_date', INTERVAL 5 DAY))"
                     -- SUB-SUB-CASE there is no data for CURRENT_DATE - 6
                        ELSE "date IN (DATE($Jahr,1,31), LAST_DAY(DATE($Jahr,2,1)), DATE_SUB('$today_date', INTERVAL 6 DAY))"
                     END
               -- SUB-CASE only January is closed
                WHEN '$current_timestamp' >= TIMESTAMP(DATETIME($Jahr, 2, 5, 7, 0, 0)) THEN 
                     CASE
                     -- SUB-SUB-CASE there is data for CURRENT_DATE - 5
                        WHEN EXTRACT(HOUR FROM TIMESTAMP('$current_timestamp')) >= 7 THEN "date IN (DATE($Jahr,1,31), DATE_SUB('$today_date', INTERVAL 5 DAY))"
                     -- SUB-SUB-CASE there is no data for CURRENT_DATE - 6
                        ELSE "date IN (DATE($Jahr,1,31), DATE_SUB('$today_date', INTERVAL 6 DAY))"
                     END
               -- SUB-CASE no month is closed and there is data for CURRENT_DATE - 5
                WHEN EXTRACT(HOUR FROM TIMESTAMP('$current_timestamp')) >= 7 THEN "date = DATE_SUB('$today_date', INTERVAL 5 DAY)"
               -- SUB-CASE no month is closed and there is data for CURRENT_DATE - 5
                ELSE "date IN (DATE_SUB('$today_date', INTERVAL 6 DAY))"
             END

WHEN 14 THEN CASE
               WHEN '$current_timestamp' < TIMESTAMP(DATETIME($Jahr, 4, 6, 7, 0, 0)) THEN "date IN (DATE($Jahr,4,30), DATE($Jahr,5,31), DATE($Jahr,6,30))"
                WHEN '$current_timestamp' >= TIMESTAMP(DATETIME($Jahr, 7, 5, 7, 0, 0)) THEN "date IN (DATE($Jahr,4,30), DATE($Jahr,5,31), DATE($Jahr,6,30))"
                WHEN '$current_timestamp' >= TIMESTAMP(DATETIME($Jahr, 6, 5, 7, 0, 0)) THEN 
                     CASE
                        WHEN EXTRACT(HOUR FROM TIMESTAMP('$current_timestamp')) >= 7 THEN "date IN (DATE($Jahr,4,30), DATE($Jahr,5,31), DATE_SUB('$today_date', INTERVAL 5 DAY))"
                        ELSE "date IN (DATE($Jahr,4,30), DATE($Jahr,5,31), DATE_SUB('$today_date', INTERVAL 6 DAY))"
                     END
                WHEN '$current_timestamp' >= TIMESTAMP(DATETIME($Jahr, 5, 5, 7, 0, 0)) THEN 
                     CASE
                        WHEN EXTRACT(HOUR FROM TIMESTAMP('$current_timestamp')) >= 7 THEN "date IN (DATE($Jahr,4,30), DATE_SUB('$today_date', INTERVAL 5 DAY))"
                        ELSE "date IN (DATE($Jahr,4,30), DATE_SUB('$today_date', INTERVAL 6 DAY))"
                     END
                WHEN EXTRACT(HOUR FROM TIMESTAMP('$current_timestamp')) >= 7 THEN "date = DATE_SUB('$today_date', INTERVAL 5 DAY)"
                ELSE "date IN (DATE_SUB('$today_date', INTERVAL 6 DAY))"
             END
             
WHEN 15 THEN CASE 
               WHEN '$current_timestamp' < TIMESTAMP(DATETIME($Jahr, 7, 6, 7, 0, 0)) THEN "date IN (DATE($Jahr,7,31), DATE($Jahr,8,31), DATE($Jahr,9,30))"
                WHEN '$current_timestamp' >= TIMESTAMP(DATETIME($Jahr, 10, 5, 7, 0, 0)) THEN "date IN (DATE($Jahr,7,31), DATE($Jahr,8,31), DATE($Jahr,9,30))"
                WHEN '$current_timestamp' >= TIMESTAMP(DATETIME($Jahr, 9, 5, 7, 0, 0)) THEN 
                     CASE
                        WHEN EXTRACT(HOUR FROM TIMESTAMP('$current_timestamp')) >= 7 THEN "date IN (DATE($Jahr,7,31), DATE($Jahr,8,31), DATE_SUB('$today_date', INTERVAL 5 DAY))"
                        ELSE "date IN (DATE($Jahr,7,31), DATE($Jahr,8,31), DATE_SUB('$today_date', INTERVAL 6 DAY))"
                     END
                WHEN '$current_timestamp' >= TIMESTAMP(DATETIME($Jahr, 8, 5, 7, 0, 0)) THEN 
                     CASE
                        WHEN EXTRACT(HOUR FROM TIMESTAMP('$current_timestamp')) >= 7 THEN "date IN (DATE($Jahr,7,31), DATE_SUB('$today_date', INTERVAL 5 DAY))"
                        ELSE "date IN (DATE($Jahr,7,31), DATE_SUB('$today_date', INTERVAL 6 DAY))"
                     END
                WHEN EXTRACT(HOUR FROM TIMESTAMP('$current_timestamp')) >= 7 THEN "date = DATE_SUB('$today_date', INTERVAL 5 DAY)"
                ELSE "date IN (DATE_SUB('$today_date', INTERVAL 6 DAY))"

               WHEN '$current_timestamp' < TIMESTAMP(DATETIME($Jahr, 10, 6, 7, 0, 0)) THEN "date IN (DATE($Jahr,10,31), DATE($Jahr,11,30), DATE($Jahr,12,31))"

                     CASE
                        WHEN EXTRACT(HOUR FROM TIMESTAMP('$current_timestamp')) >= 7 THEN "date IN (DATE($Jahr,10,31), DATE_SUB('$today_date', INTERVAL 5 DAY))"
                        ELSE "date IN (DATE($Jahr,10,31), DATE_SUB('$today_date', INTERVAL 6 DAY))"

     END

                WHEN EXTRACT(HOUR FROM TIMESTAMP('$current_timestamp')) >= 7 THEN DATE_SUB('$today_date', INTERVAL 5 DAY)
                ELSE  DATE_SUB('$today_date', INTERVAL 6 DAY)
              END

                WHEN '$current_timestamp' >= TIMESTAMP(DATETIME($Jahr, 7, 5, 7, 0, 0)) THEN DATE($Jahr,6,30)
                WHEN '$current_timestamp' < TIMESTAMP(DATETIME($Jahr, 1, 6, 7, 0, 0)) THEN DATE($Jahr,6,30)
                WHEN EXTRACT(HOUR FROM TIMESTAMP('$current_timestamp')) >= 7 THEN DATE_SUB('$today_date', INTERVAL 5 DAY)
                ELSE DATE_SUB('$today_date', INTERVAL 6 DAY)
              END
             
WHEN 18 THEN CASE
                WHEN '$current_timestamp' >= TIMESTAMP(DATETIME($Jahr+1, 1, 5, 7, 0, 0)) THEN DATE($Jahr,12,31)
                WHEN '$current_timestamp' < TIMESTAMP(DATETIME($Jahr, 7, 6, 7, 0, 0)) THEN DATE($Jahr,12,31)
                WHEN EXTRACT(HOUR FROM TIMESTAMP('$current_timestamp')) >= 7 THEN DATE_SUB('$today_date', INTERVAL 5 DAY)
                ELSE DATE_SUB('$today_date', INTERVAL 6 DAY)
              END

WHEN 19 THEN CASE
                WHEN '$current_timestamp' >= TIMESTAMP(DATETIME($Jahr+1, 1, 5, 7, 0, 0)) THEN DATE($Jahr,12,31)
                WHEN '$current_timestamp' < TIMESTAMP(DATETIME($Jahr, 1, 6, 7, 0, 0)) THEN DATE($Jahr,12,31)
                WHEN EXTRACT(HOUR FROM TIMESTAMP('$current_timestamp')) >= 7 THEN DATE_SUB('$today_date', INTERVAL 5 DAY)
                ELSE DATE_SUB('$today_date', INTERVAL 6 DAY)
              END

ELSE CASE
        WHEN '$current_timestamp' >= TIMESTAMP(DATETIME_ADD(DATETIME($Jahr, $month_as_number, 5, 7, 0, 0), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) THEN LAST_DAY(DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,1))
        WHEN '$current_timestamp' < TIMESTAMP(DATETIME($Jahr, $month_as_number, 6, 7, 0, 0)) THEN LAST_DAY(DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,1))
        WHEN EXTRACT(HOUR FROM TIMESTAMP('$current_timestamp')) >= 7 THEN DATE_SUB('$today_date', INTERVAL 5 DAY)
        ELSE DATE_SUB('$today_date', INTERVAL 6 DAY)
     END

)

SELECT CASE
WHEN $month_as_number > 12 THEN ""
ELSE """CASE
    WHEN aktuell_summe / vormonat_summe - 1 > 0 THEN CONCAT("+",REPLACE(CAST(ROUND((aktuell_summe / vormonat_summe - 1) * 100,0) AS STRING),".",","),"%")
    ELSE CONCAT(REPLACE(CAST(ROUND((aktuell_summe / vormonat_summe - 1) * 100,0) AS STRING),".",","),"%") END,"""
END

SELECT 
CASE MAX(tmstp)
  WHEN NULL THEN "N/A"
  ELSE FORMAT_DATETIME("%d.%m.%Y | %H:%M Uhr", DATETIME((TIMESTAMP(MAX(tmstp))),"Europe/Berlin") )
  END
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.NDR_podcast_episode_daily_f`
WHERE date > DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 10 day)
